content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2022 World Series Packages

For baseball fans, there’s no better time of year than October. With the regular season under their belts, the best two teams in the league will play the only seven (or less) games that really matter and you could be there to witness it all live. Our 2022 World Series Travel Packages are fully customizable with your choice of games, tickets anywhere in the host stadiums, your preferred hotel category, and any other extras that will make your experience absolutely perfect.

Baseball simply doesn’t get any better than the fall classic. Join us in 2022 and be part of the tradition and history at the sport’s biggest event. We’d love to help you experience this beloved championship exactly the way you want. Complete 2022 World Series Packages available from $2,595 per person.
